alert.note: Alert for Northern Ventura County Mountains; Southern Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 31 at 2:01AM PST until February 01 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 4 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations up to 18 inches possible above 7000 feet, up to 6 inches between 6000 and 7000 feet and a dusting to 3 inches between 4500 and 6000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Southern Ventura County Mountains and Northern Ventura County Mountains. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 4 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling 1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.

area.areaDesc: Northern Ventura County Mountains; Southern Ventura County Mountains
